dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SJ 72 IS: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Internal Revenue Service relating to “Estate Tax Closing Letter User Fee Update”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Whitehouse introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Internal Revenue Service relating to Estate Tax Closing Letter User Fee Update.

section.text: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Internal Revenue Service relating to Estate Tax Closing Letter User Fee Update (90 Fed. Reg. 21410 (May 20, 2025)), and such rule shall have no force or effect.
